description:
"Nightmare 1" technica metal engraving, etching and water ink.

The great beauty of metal engraving is the possibility of different shades of gray mixed with shadow and light to form the image. Metal engraving requires certain skills both in understanding drawing and in matrix production. The matrix is an iron plate etched with acid and the image is always etched inverted. To start our life in the NFts universe, we separate the work entitled "Nightmare1". in this work we feel the variations of gray and black highlighting the lines. Its composition describes a nightmare where one hand holds a tormented head, another hand tries to fix the head to the dream, while the other two hands have bad intentions.
